SEARCH
Package be.moesmedia.scenarioweaver.core

Class TestScenarioBuilder<TPayload,TContext extends TestScenarioContext<TPayload>>

java.lang.Object
be.moesmedia.scenarioweaver.core.TestScenarioBuilder<TPayload,TContext>
Type Parameters:
TPayload - the type of the payload used in the scenario
TContext - the type of the scenario context, extending TestScenarioContext
public final class TestScenarioBuilder<TPayload,TContext extends TestScenarioContext<TPayload>> extends Object
Builds TestScenario instances using a fluent API.

Example usage: 

 TestScenarioBuilder.builder()
     .actionProvider(...)
     .assertionsProviders(...)
     .build();

  • Method Details

    • builder

      public static <TPayload, TContext extends TestScenarioContext<TPayload>> TestScenarioBuilder<TPayload,TContext> builder()
      Creates a new TestScenarioBuilder instance.

      Use this method to start building a test scenario fluently.

      Type Parameters:
      TPayload - the type of the payload
      TContext - the type of the test scenario context
      Returns:
      a new TestScenarioBuilder instance

    • withAction

      public static <TPayload, TContext extends TestScenarioContext<TPayload>> TestScenarioBuilder<TPayload,TContext> withAction(ActionProvider<TPayload,TContext> provider)
      Creates a new TestScenarioBuilder instance with the given ActionProvider.

      Use this method to start building a test scenario with an initial action provider.

      Type Parameters:
      TPayload - the type of the payload
      TContext - the type of the test scenario context
      Parameters:
      provider - the action provider to use for the scenario
      Returns:
      a new TestScenarioBuilder instance with the action provider set
